trans-unit.source: Hence, QDoc parses each source file once and only once and doesn't need to read index files. This is what makes single execution mode much faster than the standard mode. It is anticipated that the Qt build system will eventually run QDoc in single execution mode. However, changes to the master qdocconf file might be required, so the method described above for running QDoc in single execution mode might have to change, watch this space for updates.
trans-unit.target: 因此,QDoc对每个源文件只解析一次,不需要读取索引文件。这就是单执行模式比标准模式快得多的原因。预计Qt构建系统最终会在单执行模式下运行QDoc。但是,可能需要对主qdocconf文件进行修改,所以上面介绍的在单执行模式下运行QDoc的方法可能要改变,请关注本空间的更新。

trans-unit.source: Here s1 has two children: s2 and s3. When s2 is entered, the property fooBar will have the value 2.0, since this is explicitly defined for the state. When the machine is in state s3, no value is defined for the state, but s1 defines the property to be 1.0, so this is the value that will be assigned to fooBar.
trans-unit.target: s1 在这里有两个孩子： s2 和 s3 。当 s2 输入，物业 fooBar 将有2.0的值，因为这是明确为国家定义。当计算机处于状态 s3 时，没有为状态定义任何值，但是 s1 将属性定义为1.0，因此这是将分配给 fooBar 的值。

trans-unit.source: Here we define two states of a user interface. In s1 the button is small, and in s2 it is bigger. If we click the button to transition from s1 to s2, the geometry of the button will be set immediately when a given state has been entered. If we want the transition to be smooth, however, all we need to do is make a QPropertyAnimation and add this to the transition object.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们定义了用户界面的两种状态。在 s1 中， button 较小，在 s2 中，按钮较大。如果单击按钮以从 s1 过渡到 s2 ，则在输入给定状态后将立即设置按钮的几何形状。但是，如果我们希望过渡平滑，则只需做一个QPropertyAnimation并将其添加到过渡对象中即可。

trans-unit.source: Here's a partial list of the C++ and Qt types that can serve as keys in a QHash: any integer type (char, unsigned long, etc.), any pointer type, QChar, QString, and QByteArray. Many other Qt classes also declare a qHash overload for their type; please refer to the documentation of each class.

trans-unit.source: Here, modifying buttonText directly modifies the textItem.text value; it does not change some other value that then updates textItem.text. If buttonText was not an alias, changing its value would not actually change the displayed text at all, as property bindings are not bi-directional: the buttonText value would have changed if textItem.text was changed, but not the other way around.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，修改 buttonText 直接修改textItem.text值；它不会更改其他值，然后更新textItem.text。如果 buttonText 不是别名，则更改其值实际上根本不会更改显示的文本，因为属性绑定不是双向的：如果更改了textItem.text，则 buttonText 的值将发生更改，但反之则没有。

trans-unit.source: Historically, Qt used to provide functions which were direct equivalents of many STL algorithmic functions. Starting with Qt 5.0, you are instead encouraged to use directly the implementations available in the STL; most of the Qt ones have been deprecated (although they are still available to keep the old code compiling).
trans-unit.target: 历史上,Qt曾经提供了许多STL算法函数的直接等价物的函数,从Qt 5.0开始,鼓励你直接使用STL中的实现。从Qt 5.0开始,我们鼓励你直接使用STL中可用的实现;大多数Qt的实现已经被废弃了(尽管它们仍然可用来保持旧代码的编译)。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the DropShadow item position. Often, the DropShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered exactly under the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义渲染的阴影与DropShadow项位置相比的偏移量。通常，DropShadow项是锚定的，以便它填充源元素。在这种情况下，如果将Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性设置为0，则阴影将恰好在源项目下呈现。通过更改偏移属性，可以相对于源项放置阴影。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the InnerShadow item position. Often, the InnerShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered fully inside the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义了与InnerShadow项位置相比，渲染阴影的偏移量。通常，InnerShadow项是锚定的，以便它填充源元素。在这种情况下，如果将Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性设置为0，则阴影将完全呈现在源项目内部。通过更改偏移属性，可以相对于源项放置阴影。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the DropShadow item position. Often, the DropShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered exactly under the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义渲染的阴影与DropShadow项位置相比的偏移量。通常，DropShadow项是锚定的，以便它填充源元素。在这种情况下，如果将Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性设置为0，则阴影将恰好在源项目下呈现。通过更改偏移属性，可以相对于源项放置阴影。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the InnerShadow item position. Often, the InnerShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered fully inside the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义了与InnerShadow项位置相比，渲染阴影的偏移量。通常，InnerShadow项是锚定的，以便它填充源元素。在这种情况下，如果将Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性设置为0，则阴影将完全呈现在源项目内部。通过更改偏移属性，可以相对于源项放置阴影。

trans-unit.source: Host Nodes use custom URLs to simplify connections. Currently, QtRO supports two types of connections:

Host Nodes use custom URLs to simplify connections. While the list will likely be extended, QtRO currently supports two types of connections. A "tcp" connection (using the standard tcp/ip protocol) supports connections between devices as well as between processes on the same device. A "local" connection (which can have less overhead, depending on the underlying OS features) only supports connections between processes on the same device.
trans-unit.target: 主机节点使用自定义URL来简化连接。虽然这个列表可能会被扩展,但QtRO目前支持两种类型的连接,一种是 "tcp "连接(使用标准的tcp/ip协议),支持设备之间以及同一设备上的进程之间的连接。一个 "tcp "连接(使用标准的tcp/ip协议)支持设备之间以及同一设备上的进程之间的连接。本地 "连接(根据底层操作系统的特性,它的开销可能较小)只支持同一设备上的进程之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Hover events are delivered when there is no current mouse grabber item. They are sent when the mouse cursor enters an item, when it moves around inside the item, and when the cursor leaves an item. Hover events are commonly used to highlight an item when it's entered, and for tracking the mouse cursor as it hovers over the item (equivalent to QWidget::mouseTracking).
trans-unit.target: 没有当前的鼠标采集器项目时，将传递悬停事件。当鼠标光标进入一个项目时，它们在该项目内部移动时以及当光标离开一个项目时，将发送它们。悬停事件通常用于在输入项目时突出显示该项目，并在其悬停在项目上时跟踪鼠标光标（等效于QWidget :: mouseTracking）。

trans-unit.source: Hover events are only provided if acceptHoverEvents() is true.
trans-unit.target: 仅当acceptHoverEvents（）为true 时才提供悬停事件。

trans-unit.source: However, for all member functions that take a key parameter, QCborMap provides overloads that will work efficiently with integers and strings. In fact, the use of integer keys is encouraged, since they occupy fewer bytes to transmit and are simpler to encode and decode. Newer protocols designed by the IETF CoRE WG to work specifically with CBOR are known to use them.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对于所有带有关键参数的成员函数，QCborMap提供了可以有效使用整数和字符串的重载。实际上，鼓励使用整数密钥，因为它们占用更少的字节进行传输，并且更易于编码和解码。由IETF CoRE WG设计的专门用于CBOR的较新协议已在使用它们。

trans-unit.source: However, for all member functions that take a key parameter, QCborMap provides overloads that will work efficiently with integers and strings. In fact, the use of integer keys is encouraged, since they occupy fewer bytes to transmit and are simpler to encode and decode. Newer protocols designed by the IETF CoRE WG to work specifically with CBOR are known to use them.

However, having collection files to merge many documentation sets may lead to some problems. For example, one index keyword may be defined in different documentation sets. So, when only seeing a keyword in the index and activating it, you cannot be sure that the expected documentation will be shown. Therefore, the Qt help system offers the possibility to filter the help contents after certain attributes. This requires, however, that the attributes have been assigned to the help contents before the generation of the compressed help file.
trans-unit.target: 然而,拥有集合文件来合并许多文档集可能会导致一些问题。例如,一个索引关键字可能在不同的文档集中被定义。因此,当只看到索引中的一个关键字并激活它时,你不能确定会显示预期的文档。因此,Qt帮助系统提供了在某些属性后过滤帮助内容的可能性。但是,这要求在生成压缩帮助文件之前,这些属性已经被分配到帮助内容中。
